 Hello,=20

I am new to JUnit and am using JUnit with JBuilder.=20

I am calling a method of a testee class from my test case...=20
Now in the testee method, it has to access a global variable "logger"=20
(required for logging purpose) defined in that class.=20
When i run the test case it gives me NullPointertException for "logger"=20
as it is not able to access it.=20
Can someone please tell me why it cannot access "logger"...=20

Thanks in advance.
